body: We've looked at the Grammys, now let's dig into the betting data for 2021 Oscars Predictions. We'll be using the market analytics from Betfair to power our graphs here. The wisdom of crowds in full effect. You'll see some great movement in the market late. Like when Parasite was backed in hard on Oscar morning. So make sure you return to the site as the event leads up. Let's check out the betting probabilities for the biggest awards: > * Best Picture > * Leading Actor > * Leading Actress > * Supporting Actor > * Supporting Actress Plus more. - - - ## **Best Picture** Nomadland won the Golden Globe, and has only got firmer in the market. It's a dominant favorite. But we remember when Parasite got backed off the map from 7-1, so we will be watching The Trial of the Chicago 7 and a few others in the field. But Nomadland looks very hard to beat. - - - ## **Leading Actor** Chadwick Boseman is an overwhelming favorite. His heart breaking fight with cancer and Golden Globe winning effort in Ma Rainey's Black Bottom makes him impossible to bet against. Riz Ahmed is the only other runner in the market. - - - ## **Leading Actress** Probably the tightest market to watch. Could go multiple ways. - - - ## **Supporting Actor** - - - ## **Supporting Actress** Yuh-Jung Youn has been backed off the map. She wasn't in the market previously. - - - ## **Animated Feature** - - - ## **Best Director** Chloe Zhao would have her script ready here. - - - ## **Documentary Feature** Have only seen My Octopus Teacher here. Which got brilliant support from Netflix but didn't feel like an Icarus sized doco, despite the amazing cinematography. - - - # **Want entertainment predictions for all the other big events? Sign up for the Wednesday email.** # **We promise it's worth your time.** #
title: Oscars Predictions 2021: Your Betting Picks
description: If you want expert 2021 Oscars Predictions, from professional sports bettors, then click on through. Unlike the blog crowd, we put our money where our mouth is. 2021 Oscars Predictions.
